name: ダークセイバー
summary: Dark Savior (ダークセイバー dāku seibā) is an isometric 3D mixed genre video game for the Sega Saturn created by Climax Entertainment. It was referred to by GameSpot as a sequel to the developer's game for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, Landstalker: The Treasures of King Nole, even though the games' storylines are unrelated and their gameplay is considerably different.
info:
• 中文名: 黑暗救世主
  • 发行: SEGA
  • 别名: DARK SAVIOR
  • 别名: 异域冒险
  • 平台: SS
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1996年8月30日
  • 开发: クライマックス
